text: Carly Rae Patterson (born February 4, 1988 in Baton Rouge, Louisiana) was an American gymnast. She was the 2004 Olympic All-Around Champion.Carly Patterson at USA Gymnastics. Retrieved 2012-07-22. After the Olympics, she started working as a singer. She lives in Allen, Texas. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:American gymnasts Category:Singers from Louisiana Category:Singers from Texas Category:Sportspeople from Baton Rouge, Louisiana Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Carly Patterson
